operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO chats (creator_user_id, access_hash, random_id, participant_count, title, about, date) VALUES (:creator_user_id, :access_hash, :random_id, :participant_count, :title, :about, :date)

operation.name: Select
operation.sql: SELECT id, creator_user_id, access_hash, participant_count, title, about, photo_id, link, admins_enabled, default_banned_rights, migrated_to_id, migrated_to_access_hash, deactivated, version, date FROM chats WHERE id=:id

operation.name: SelectPhotoId
operation.sql: SELECT photo_id FROM chats WHERE id=:id

operation.name: SelectLastCreator
operation.sql: SELECT id, creator_user_id, access_hash, participant_count, title, about, photo_id, link, admins_enabled, default_banned_rights, migrated_to_id, migrated_to_access_hash, deactivated, version, date FROM chats WHERE creator_user_id=:creator_user_id ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1

operation.name: UpdateTitle
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET title=:title, version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateAbout
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET about = :about WHERE id=:id

operation.name: SelectByIdList
operation.sql: SELECT id, creator_user_id, access_hash, participant_count, title, about, photo_id, admins_enabled, default_banned_rights, migrated_to_id, migrated_to_access_hash, deactivated, version, date FROM chats WHERE id IN (:idList)

operation.name: UpdateParticipantCount
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET participant_count=:participant_count, version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdatePhotoId
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET photo_id=:photo_id, version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateAdminsEnabled
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET admins_enabled=:admins_enabled, version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateDefaultBannedRights
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET default_banned_rights=:default_banned_rights, version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateVersion
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateDeactivated
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET deactivated=:deactivated, version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: SelectByLink
operation.sql: SELECT id, creator_user_id, access_hash, participant_count, title, about, photo_id, link, admins_enabled, default_banned_rights, migrated_to_id, migrated_to_access_hash, deactivated, version, date FROM chats WHERE deactivated = 0 AND link = :link

operation.name: UpdateLink
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET link=:link, date=:date, version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateMigratedTo
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET migrated_to_id = :migrated_to_id, migrated_to_access_hash = :migrated_to_access_hash, participant_count = 0, deactivated = 1, version=version+1 WHERE id=:id
